summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Novatech Education Center website. All core features working correctly including multi-language support (Azerbaijani default), real country flags, theme persistence, navigation, admin panel, and backend APIs.
passed_tests: Backend API connectivity (15/15 tests passed - 100% success rate)
Database seeding and admin user creation
All CRUD operations for courses, testimonials, teachers, blogs
Contact form and course application submissions
Homepage loads with Azerbaijani as default language
Language switcher shows real country flags from flagcdn.com
Theme preference persistence after page reload
Language preference persistence after page reload
Navigation between all pages (Home, About, Courses, Blog, Contact)
Courses page displays courses with proper filtering
Course detail page navigation and content display
FAQ accordion functionality on course detail pages
Contact form field detection and submission
Admin login at /nova-admin with correct credentials
Admin dashboard displaying analytics and management options
